Text:
I didn't go for this as 2-girl isn't my cup of tea (unless I'm involved myself), but I appreciate it nevertheless!

Could a I please put in a request for hardtied 2006-09? There are older posts, but most are dead by now. 

I have many and could post hem individually in hope for fillers. But I'd prefer as a group if I can. Working on 2007 at the moment form elsewhere.
